name: Waves of Turmoil
description:
Stand your ground with up to four players against rioting citizens and protect democracy!

In this game, you take control of a riot police officer. And stand your ground against waves of protesters. As such you can command riot police in the field, and call on police assets. If it is too difficult alone, it has co-op with up to 4 players, be aware that money is pooled for the team.

How long can  you keep the politician speaking? (our top time was  slightly less then 13 minutes)

Appropriate force:
Call on weapons to subdue the rioters, you start with a baton, there are also a shotgun and a gas grenade.

Backup:
Call officers, and form defensive lines. Or get backup in the form of a water canon truck.

Morale:
Your riot police as well as the rioters have a hidden morale bar. If they get beat up to
much they will leave to go home.  The players their weapons will only hit rioters.

The game was made in 48 hours for the Global Game jam 2017. It has bugs, and sometimes the feedback is not too clear, but if you have any thoughts we would love to hear them.

Comment with your longest time!

Made by Convoy Games And Friends!
